title: Telephone Input
description: Helps users enter telephone numbers with country code support

frontMatter.title: Telephone Input
frontMatter.description: Helps users enter telephone numbers with country code support

when_to_use.value: Collecting domestic U.S. and international phone numbers
Allowing users to enter numbers in familiar formats (spaces, hyphens, brackets, dashes accepted)
Need to gather multiple phone numbers on a single page with unique labeling

when_to_consider_else.value: Avoid if phone number collection isn't necessary for the service

accessibility.value: **Keyboard Navigation**: Tab to combo box, use arrow keys for options, Enter to select
**Focus Indicator**: Clear outline appears on focused elements
**Screen Readers**: Combo box announces as "Country code" with selected country
**Flag Images**: Decorative flags have undefined alt text (appropriate for non-informative icons)
**Error Prevention**: Real-time validation prevents form submission with invalid numbers

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- With country selector -->
<va-telephone-input
  label="Home phone number"
  name="homePhone"
  required
></va-telephone-input>

<!-- Without country selector -->
<va-telephone-input
  label="Phone number"
  name="phone"
  no-country
  required
></va-telephone-input>
